message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
You can have 300k, I'll take the rest. It's a fair deal!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still taking the lead!
I'll give you 400k, but I'm still hoping to get more!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still not giving in! You'll have to make a better offer if you want to win!
I'll give you 350k, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not giving in! Meet me in the middle or walk away!
